The wanted murderer proceeds preparation to kill Kigata first. By spreading a bundle of huge animalâ€™s hair down outside a window of the lodge and making a fake foot prints of a big snowman, the murderer makes the impression of snowman stick in their mind of the uncle and Saho, and tells Kigata to come out of the lodge at 8 pm sharp.

titles.title: Pages in Red (The World of Bizarrerie) Horror of a Mountain Cabin Part 3
